question:
What is the value of \(\sqrt{\frac{3}{2}} - \sqrt{\frac{2}{3}}\) ?
A. \(\frac{\sqrt{3} - \sqrt{2} }{\sqrt{6}}\)
B. \(\frac{1}{\sqrt{6}}\)
C. \(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}\)
D. \(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}\)
E. \(\frac{\sqrt{5}}{\sqrt{6}}\)
